remarks: A vertex in a graph is a neighbor of a second vertex if and only if the second vertex is a neighbor of the first vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.)
statement: nbgrasym $p |- ( V USGrph E -> ( N e. ( <. V , E >. Neighbors K ) <-> K e. ( <. V , E >. Neighbors N ) ) ) $.
